thread.section_title: Hilton Times Square - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (New York City) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Excellent value
thread.title_full: Excellent value - Review of Hilton Times Square, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: GSEdwards45
title: Excellent value
text: The room was well appointed and decent sized for NYC. The price for the Times Square area was very compelling. The hotel staff was efficient and my wife and I enjoyed the bar. We arrived and were told we were upgraded - bonus. The only thing keeping this from being excellent was that the day after we checked in, someone from the hotel thought the room should have been vacant, causing me some concern over our upgrade status. Other than that, it was great.
